tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Vinay Sir is an excellent orthopedician. His vast experience with excellent skills (both clinical & surgical) is a blessing to any patient. I would highly recommend Dr. Vinay Sir.

********* ********** went in to consult for my leg pain issue I am facing for over a month .he asked me about what I do , my working habits and my background and checked my legs and based on all details he suggested it's due to stress and long working hours sitting at one place there are are lot of toxins that need to be flushed out causing the pain. he prescribed some meds for thre same and am feeling much better now.will visit again after the meds course is completed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
This was for the first time that I visited Dr. Vinayaraj & so was very anxious but came back satisfied as he explained the cause of my knee pain & advised well.
I am satisfied with his genuineness & the treatment. I can refer other patients with osteoarthritis to him.

I have been operated and treated by him for Spondylolisthesis -A spinal disorder in which a bone (vertebra) slips forward onto the bone below it. This being a very complex disorder he operated me and set it right since then I am have been pain free and my lower back never felt better.*** ** *** ** ** *** **** ***** *** **** ** ********* you will surely be in the  most safest hands with Dr VinayRaj

Dr has come early and seen the patient even before the appointment time It gave us an unexpected thrilling experience compared to waiting for several minutes, sometimes even an hour. The Doctor has patiently listened to our ailment and explained in clear terms the problem and procedure to be followed. we highly recommend for others.
Doctor didn't show up, after waiting for more than 30mins I was informed doctor is not coming to hospital. Very poor experience.

Doctors was friendly and helped with issue straight forward.
Listened the concern with open ears and helped with ease in the issue
I visited doctor vinayaraj for back pain..He understood by my problem and even explained it me properly and treated it well...

Doctor is been very good. He patiently listen to us. He analyses properly and explains the problem and solution.  He does not unnecessary recommend medicines or treatment. Always been a nice experience visiting the doc.
